name: Gray Mansion
description:
Gray Mansion is a roguelike made by Dean and Jim for 7DRL 2022.

After a near-fatal accident on the road, you are left bleeding profusely. Because of a genetic disease that prevents your blood from clotting, you will bleed until you're dead unless you can find help. So you have decided to venture into a nearby spooky mansion to look for help.

Battle all sorts of scary monsters as you try to survive this harrowing experience as long as possible.
